QuestData.Title: Re-Introductions
QuestData.Description:
Though you have chosen your path, the fate of the Shadowlands has yet to be determined.
The power of the Banished One grows. It falls to you, and others of your kind, to thwart him.
The Arbiter's Honored Voice, Tal-Inara, will aid you in choosing a covenant. Bolstering their strength offers our best chance at victory.
Let the Purpose guide you, $n. Always.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Tal-Inara within the Enclave in Oribos.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Tal-Inara within the Enclave in Oribos.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, $n. I was wondering when you were going to appear. Your aid is needed.
